collectible.title: Fur Scarf
collectible.subtitle: There's nothing faux about this accessory
collectible.text: A wolf pelt sewn into the shape of a scarf. Leonie comes from a village of hunters, and thus knows how to make her own clothes from wild game. One of her possible lost items. (Art credit: Bad Chemistry)
collectible.unlock: Finish a game where Leonie loses. (You don't need to win, she just needs to lose.)

collectible.title: Hand Drawn Map
collectible.subtitle: Memento of a time spent with the best Captain
collectible.text: A practical map of the forest made by Captain Jeralt. Leonie kept this as a reminder of her time as his apprentice. One of her possible lost items. (Art credit: Bad Chemistry)
collectible.unlock: See dialogue from Leonie mentioning Jeralt. (Across multiple games, selection screen does not count.)

collectible.title: Crude Arrowheads
collectible.subtitle: Save gold by making arrows at home!
collectible.text:
Rough-hewn arrowheads fashioned from rocks. They belong to one who favors the bow. One of her possible lost items.
(Art credit: Bad Chemistry)
collectible.unlock: Win a game featuring Leonie after she has entered Rivalry mode. (She enters Rivalry mode when playing against multiple males, or sooner if you pick a certain name.)
